SharePoint is a great bridge for that, said Steve Ballmer in an interview with InformationWeek. The title derives from a frequently parodied Donald Rumsfeld response to a reporter's question about whether there actually was evidence of any link between Saddam Hussein and terrorists seeking weapons of mass destruction. The Defense secretary responded: Reports that say that something hasn't happened are always interesting to me because, as we know, there are known knowns; there are things we know we know. We also know there are known unknowns; that is to say we know there are some things we do not know. But there are also unknown unknowns- the ones we don't know we don't know. . Back in October, The Blaze reported that Indiana Republican Congressman Mike Pence was considering stepping down from his post as House Republican Chairman in order to run for president in 2012. Similarly, Politico wrote, Mike Pence , a darling of the conservative movement, would leave the leadership job with a blunt explanation to colleagues that he can't commit to a two-year term in House leadership, a source familiar with his deliberations. Mike Pence was the winner of a presidential straw poll at the Values Voter Summit in Washington, D.C. Mike Pence edged out Mike Huckabee , former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney , former House Speaker Newt Gingrich , and Sarah Palin .

Joe Banner . Joe Banner talked about what the Eagles' offseason approach will be. "Our view is really no different than what you see going around the league," Joe Banner said. With the unknown of the collective barganining agreement, we've decided- and everybody can make their own decision- that it's safer to wait, be patient, let's see what the landscape is and move forward. "So we don't rule out doing things, and at the same time at this point, we haven't done anything, and it's overwhelmingly related to just kind of the uncertainty of where things are headed. Two of the Eagles' main offseason decisions pertain to Michael Vick and DeSean Jackson .
